string.text:
Cut off from something a piece of cloth. Can be used for cleaning anything. Broader use-as a bandage,but first you need to disinfect.

 %c[0,140,140,140] CHARACTERISTICS:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] daily item
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] used with: %c[0,170,170,170] repair of equipment,maintenance of weapons (1%)

Back,butt from shotgun or rifle. Can be used to replace an existing one.

 %c[0,140,140,140] CHARACTERISTICS:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military article
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] used with: %c[0,170,170,170] care of arms (6%)

Trigger mechanism that was pulled out of an unknown firearm. Most of the triggers are similar to each other,so this item is quite versatile and allows replacing it in many other rifles.

 %c[0,140,140,140] CHARACTERISTICS:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military article
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] used with: %c[0,170,170,170] care of arms (5%)

A rusted trigger mechanism that was pulled out of an unknown firearm. Terrible in the current state,but can be restored with the help of cleaners.

 %c[0,140,140,140] CHARACTERISTICS:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military article
 %c[255,238,153,26]

A spring that was pulled out of an unknown firearm. Springs are basically the same everywhere,so they can be used to repair many other rifles.

 %c[0,140,140,140] CHARACTERISTICS:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military article
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] used with: %c[0,170,170,170] care for weapons (2%)

A handle that was pulled out of an unknown firearm. This perforated polymer handle can be doped by craftsmen for many other rifles.

 %c[0,140,140,140] CHARACTERISTICS:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military article
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] used with: %c[0,170,170,170] care of arms (6%)

the bolt,which was pulled out of an unknown firearm. Too huge for pistols and other small weapons,but it can be a substitute for many other rifles. If it is corrected,it can be used even in semi-automatic rifles.

 %c[0,140,140,140] CHARACTERISTICS:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military article
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] used with: %c[0,170,170,170] care of arms (8%)

A rusted bolt that was pulled out of an unknown firearm. Too huge for pistols and other small weapons,but it can be a substitute for many other rifles. If it is corrected,it can be used even in semi-automatic rifles.

 %c[0,140,140,140] CHARACTERISTICS:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military product
